metadata.title: CVE-2023-2725 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Use after free in Guest View in Google Chrome prior to 113.0.5672.126allowed an attacker who convinced a user to install a malicious extensionto potentially exploit heap corruption via a crafted HTML page. (Chromiumsecurity severity: High)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
